Functions:

OPEN: Opens a text file named input.txt in the file directory and reads its data
SAVE: Saves the text in the "Message" text area into a file output.txt
ENCRYPT: Takes 2 keys (Keys should be integers) and encrypts the text in the "Message" text area using the keys
DECRYPT: Takes 2 keys (Keys should be integers) and decrypts the text in the "Message" text area using the keys
